ygData.subject: Armor Deterioration
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, here s my 2 coppers worth: It would be interesting if armor did fail or become damaged in some way, at some time... I mean it happens to REAL armor
ygData.messageBody:
ok, here's my 2 coppers worth:

It would be interesting if armor did 'fail' or become 'damaged' in some way,
at some time... I mean it happens to REAL armor doesn't it?

And, as everyone knows, almost everything else has a 'failure rate' of some
sort in the game... Failure to MAKE armor, failure to cast spells, failure
to hit a mob, etc. So, why not failing armor as well?

BUT, it should be DAMAGED, not just 'deteriorating' in some way... Damaged
in battle, against, say RED mobs... And yes, only after you have had it for
a long time...

Damaged Armor could still be used, but it could be, for example, only HALF
as effective as it used to be (with all that bailing wire holding it
together, it's still THERE isn't it? hehe...) when bought new!

No, don't make it slowly 'deteriorate' and require maintenance because of
it... Let it be damaged in battle!

As I said, just my 2 coppers worth...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com
